sentences.en: A decision by the Finns to float their currency sent a shudder through the foreign exchanges.
sentences.cn: 芬兰允许其货币自由浮动的决定在外汇市场上引起了震动。

sentences.en: Another surge of pain in my ankle caused me to give an involuntary shudder.
sentences.cn: 脚踝突然又一阵疼痛，痛得我直打哆嗦。

sentences.en: As always, the gin made him shudder and even retch slightly.
sentences.cn: 像往常一样, 他感到一阵哆嗦,甚至有些恶心.

sentences.en: As we stood there staring at each other, a shudder passed through me.
sentences.cn: 我们站在那里对望着彼此，突如其来地，我感到一阵战栗。

sentences.en: Equipped in a manner which would make a modern alpinist shudder at the thought.
sentences.cn: 他们的装备如此的简陋以致使一名现代的登山者不寒而栗。

sentences.en: Just thinking about the accident makes me shudder.
sentences.cn: 只要一想起那场事故，我就发抖。

sentences.cn: 玛丽亚一走到外面就打了个冷战。

She gave a little shudder when she touched his clammy hand.

sentences.en: The news sent a shudder through the audience.
sentences.cn: 这消息使听众激动得直发抖.

sentences.en: The sight of the coffin sent a shudder through him.
sentences.cn: 看到那副棺材,他浑身一阵战栗.

sentences.en: The tank came to a halt with a shudder.
sentences.cn: 随着一阵颤动,坦克停了下来.

sentences.en: The word still causes a shudder among some of my students.
sentences.cn: 那消息还是让我的一些学生很害怕。

sentences.en: We all shudder at the thought of the dreadful dirty place.
sentences.cn: 我们一想到那可怕的肮脏地方就浑身战惊.
